amendment.description: Amendment establishes the Technology Security Division within the Defense Threat Reduction Agency as a separate DOD agency.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 9 and printed in part A of H. Rept. 106-175 to establish the Technology Security Division within the Defense Threat Reduction Agency as a separate DOD agency.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Weldon (PA) amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
